abstract: Microsoft is fiercely opposed to Google‘s proposed $3.1 billion purchase of the online advertising firm DoubleClick. But the transaction drew no outright opposition from United States senators at a hearing Thursday, which focused on the deal’s potential threats to competition and consumer privacy.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is fiercely opposed to Google‘s proposed $3.1 billion purchase of the online advertising firm DoubleClick. But the transaction drew no outright opposition from United States senators at a hearing Thursday, which focused on the deal’s potential threats to competition and consumer privacy.

abstract: Industry watchers are so hyped-up over the news that Microsoft may invest in Facebook that it has led to Gawker-Stalker-like sighting reports.
lead_paragraph: Industry watchers are so hyped-up over the news that Microsoft may invest in Facebook that it has led to Gawker-Stalker-like sighting reports.
